title: Not related to this sub but can anyone here tell me if RNSIT is good for CS branches?
content: I have a 3 year gap between 12th and BTech (passed out 12th in 2020 and joining college this year). Can anyone tell me if RNSIT is good for CS branches? Didnt find any active RNSIT subreddit (understandably so).

comments.body:
Rnsit is under vtu , that's by far the largest negative point .
And always autonomous colleges / private universities are preferred over vtu owing to the age old syllabus which never gets updated in vtu .
So appropriate take a call .
I do have a couple of friends studying in rnsit , the college is decent i guess , and judging by their insta stories and posts I think the college life there is pretty relaxed compared to what it is in pesu .
I heard it is getting its autonomous status this year.
